about.

Hey, and welcome to my online portfolio! I've been building this website over the past few weeks and I'm delighted to push the first version out! It's coded using HTML and CSS, It's my first open source project so feel free to check the code out here.

Day-to-day, I'm a Software Engineer at a leading Art-Tech company in London. Alongside my day job, I'm always looking for for new exciting projects to collaborate on and different ways to improve my skill set. At the moment my focus is on learning Typescript, React and GraphQL. I probablly rewrite this website using that tech stack in the near future. Anyway, have a nice day & thanks for checking out my portfolio. 19-06-22
